txt.en: From this landing, you can see other slaves by the pillars to the south-east
Walk with the Nurnhoth slaves
Present yourself to the Knight of Dulgabêth at Amon Thaur
Climb the stairs at Amon Thaur and look for other Nurnhoth slaves
Join the Nurnhoth slaves to the south-east, among the pillars of Amon Thaur
Talk to the Nurnhoth slave
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
Lhaereth has summoned one of the Nurnhoth slaves.
The slave dropped a pouch when he died, and now Laereth calls for you to bring it to her.
You collected the fallen pouch, and now Lhaereth wants you to bring it to her.
Lhaereth has commanded you to remain where you are.
DNT - Blah!
Dulgabêth and his knights have been betrayed. You should escape down the stairs and away from Amon Thaur before it is too late for you to get away!
Instance: Union of Evil
'I came here out of respect for Lhaereth and for Borangos.'
'Have your say and be done with it, worm.'
'Is that so?'
'Do all the Gúrzyul feel the passage of time so keenly?'
'Where do you stand, Borangos?'
'Urudanî should be grateful I freed her from those bonds.'
'Do you support this union?'
'I wonder...?'
'Hmmm.'
'Interesting.'
'Hmmm...'
'It will be my pleasure to do so.'
'This amuses me. I, too, will swear thus.'
'Death comes for you, Dulgabêth, and for your servants!'
You have obtained the disguise of a Nurnhoth slave, and now seek to infiltrate the meeting of the Masters of Mordor at Amon Thaur.
You have infiltrated the meeting of the Masters of Mordor at Amon Thaur, on the slopes of Mount Doom.
You have infiltrated the meeting of the Masters of Mordor at Amon Thaur, on the slopes of Mount Doom.
Pick up the fallen pouch where it lies

'You did not arrive with the others. Do you not fear the lash?

'Ha! It is no concern of mine! Climb the stairs and look for the others of your kind, if you dare! Dulgabêth will deal whatever punishment he deems sufficient. I look forward to the music of your screams, slave.

'Now go! Go!'
Observe the meeting of the Masters, and remain beneath their notice
'I do not... feel well...\n\n'What did the Mistress... give to me...?'
'I... I cannot...\n\n'Something is... wrong...'
Lhaereth barely looks at you as she takes the pouch from your hands.\n\n'Stay here, slave. I may have further use for you,' she says, an unmistakable air of menace in her voice.
Observe the meeting of the Masters, and remain beneath their notice
Observe the meeting of the Masters, and remain beneath their notice
Observe the meeting of the Masters, and remain beneath their notice
<rgb=#FF0000>Avoid getting too near to Urudanî, or she will see through your disguise</rgb>
'He knows the time that was chosen.'
'He delays his arrival merely as an insult to me!'
'Bah. Ugrukhôr will pay for this.'
'Who will swear fealty to Lhaereth?'
'Ugrukhôr! Didst thou lose thy way?'
Talk to the Nurnhoth slave
'I have business with another who failed Sauron.'
'Oh, I will have it, and thou willt hear me.'
'He hides now within Minas Morgul.'
'We are met at Amon Thaur, a place of great significance.'
'I want his head!'
'It was here that Lord Sauron bound the Nazgûl to his will.'
'Now, my subjects! Bring death to my foes!'
'Whenever the Nine were defeated, it was to Amon Thaur they returned.'
'Who here possesses a better claim than Lhaereth?'
'Now our Master is gone, and the Nazgûl with him.'
'There are none!'
Bring the fallen pouch to Lhaereth the Stained
'Sauron's Heir? No! You were Sauron's Undoing!'
'Go ahead.'
'Slaves! Do not linger here! Thy masters call for thee!'
'He is here!'
'What?'
'There will be only VENGEANCE!'
'I am the last of my kind.'
'For my long and loyal service, Sauron promised me a child.'
\qOne child only,\q he said to me.
\qBut after my victory is complete, and my rule stretches from the Sundering Sea to the Uttermost East.\q
'Now that victory will never come, all because of YOUR COWARDICE, pitiful Mouth of Sauron!'

Yadêphal looks at you with disinterest, but there is no recognition in his eye. The clothes you wear blind Dulgabêth's emissary to your identity. He does not know you.\n\n'Move along, slave!' he barks at you.
'Gondor brought swords to the Black Gate... and you ran!'

Yadêphal looks at you with disinterest, but there is no recognition in his eye. The clothes you wear blind Dulgabêth's emissary to your identity. He does not know you.\n\n'Move along, slave!' he barks at you. 'I have no time for Nurn's children!'
'You ran from Gondor, and you ran from Sauron, but you could not run from me.'
'You failed Sauron. I will not.'
'I claim dominion over Mordor!'
You have come in disguise to the base of Amon Thaur. Will Dulgabêth's knights permit you to gain access to the meeting?
Other slaves have already arrived. You should climb the stairs at Amon Thaur and join them.
You can see other slaves to the south-east of the landing, among the pillars of Amon Thaur. You should join them in order to avoid arousing the suspicion of the enemy.
You can see other slaves to the south-east of the landing, among the pillars of Amon Thaur. You should join them in order to avoid arousing the suspicion of the enemy.
You have infiltrated the meeting of the Masters of Mordor at Amon Thaur, on the slopes of Mount Doom.
'You know he will, my love.'
'You must have patience.'
'I have a gift for you, my love.'
'One of my slaves carries it. Let me retrieve it for you.'
'You! Slave!'
'Such weak bodies! You, then. Bring it to me.'
'Stay here and you may remain useful.'
'Wait.'
'There will be no union.'
The slave collapses, and as he falls a pouch drops from his hand
'Who... who are...'
'No... choice...'
'Not... not me... no...'
You have learned much, but now you should escape down the stairs before you are discovered!
'We are met here to fashion the new order.'
Dulgabêth and his knights have been betrayed. You should escape down the stairs and away from Amon Thaur before it is too late for you to get away!
'Great though our powers be, we do not possess the strength of Lord Sauron.'
'We cannot rule singularly.'
'It is with that in mind that Lhaereth has proposed a union.'
'She and I will wed, and together we will become the regents of Mordor!'
'If he does not, he will face the wrath of both Lhaereth and the Heir of Sauron!'
'I need no gift but thy loyalty, Lhaereth.'
Urudanî has seen through your disguise!
'Now comes my first command as Mordor's regent.'
Escape down the stairs without being discovered
'Seize Ugrukhôr, my knights! I order he be put to death!'
Escape down the stairs without being discovered
'What is this?'
Help the Nurnhoth slave
